name: product-highlight-by-vtex-segment
title: Product Highlight by Vtex Segment
description: A component that gives a highlights solution for WL Architecture for the new law Ley de Gondolas

defaultSellerId.title: Default Seller Id
defaultSellerId.description: Enter the default seller id. For example: jumboargentinav692lanus692

defaultNameCollection.title: Default Collection Name
defaultNameCollection.description: Enter the default name of the collection. For example: leyDeGondolas

imageUrlOfHighlight.title: Image Url of Highlight
imageUrlOfHighlight.description: Enter the url of the image that you want to show like Highlight.
